name: Tasty Collard Greens
author: ANADRI
summary: A classic recipe for collard greens that uses smoked turkey to add some flavor. Greens are simmered in chicken stock, then spiced with a dash of red chile flakes.
ingredients: 5 bunches collard greens - rinsed, trimmed and chopped
salt and black pepper to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat
Add garlic, and gently saute until light brown
Pour in the chicken stock, and add the turkey leg
Cover the pot, and simmer for 30 minutes
Add the   to the cooking pot, and turn the heat up to medium-high
Let the greens cook down for about 45 minutes, stirring occasionally
Reduce heat to medium, and season with salt and pepper to taste
Continue to cook until the greens are tender and dark green, 45 to 60 minutes
Mix in red pepper flakes if desired
